attributes.action: Dissolve parliament and face the electorate who pay your expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Democracy is being threatened by greed. The disgusting and immoral abuse of hard-earned money paid in tax to enable Members of Parliament to exploit those they claim to represent must end.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
